ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 559
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm.. Have you put this person on ignore? If he harasses you after putting him on ignore (say he creates another character) /report him if he continues to
ygData.messageBody:
> I usually play on Solsek Ro but I might do the server change option.
> There is another player that won't leave me alone even after I've asked
> him several times and petitioned. I don't play EQ to "hook up" I play to
> have fun and do my little quests.
>
Hmm.. Have you put this person on ignore? If he harasses you after putting
him on ignore (say he creates another character) /report him if he continues
to bother you. If the GM in-game does not answer your petition, I suggest
you contact your server GM via the website.
luv,
-Su
